description:
** V1.7: Improved graphics. Better handling in "Stay" playmode. It is now easier to release chords. Use backward gesture in play mode to get back to the menu and change play mode or amount of frets! **

Multitouch Guitar is a real guitar, e-guitar, Ukulele or Banjo for your Palm Pre! The tone changes with your fingers on the fingerboard! Touch the strings on the downside to hear sound. Hold with one hand the chords like on a real guitar and with the other the strings. As long as your fingers stay on the fingerboard your chord stays active. Touch and play with the strings and become a guitar master with your Pre or Pixi.
